title: Endings Guide
content:
and how can he save him. Mizora then responds that the way is to bargain.

Mizora then proceeds to show Wyll's contract and says that it is unbreakable. She goes on to tell you that she wants a life for a life. If Wyll wants to end the contract, then a sacrifice must be made. She offers Wyll two choices:

She will reveal his father's location but he will pledge his life and soul to her and Archdevil Zariel, in an eternal pact. She will break Wyll's contract and he will be free, but his father wi
